description: Indicates where the product is recommended to be located.
name: destination

description: Timestamp when results were generated from SDIA. UTC time.
name: finish_ts

description: A value that represents either the INCREASE or DECREASE in the percentage of lines during the forecasting horizon for an MFC area we aim to optimize.
name: lines_percentage

description: Indicates where the product is currently located (manual or in-store) based on the latest Inventory Snapshot.
name: original_location

description: The number of units in MFC derived from the latest Inventory Snapshot.
name: original_qty

description: TOM ID/IDs associated with considered ecom_item_id.
name: product_ids

description: Reflects the movement semantic, i.e what area we optimize and what actions need to be performed.
name: recommendation_type

description: The number of totes allocated for potential product inventory.
name: totes

description: The number of totes estimated for original_qty.
name: totes_for_current_stock
__pubsub_message_id
description: ID of the message assigned by PubSub
